title: P2P payment transaction receipts (Venmo, Zelle, Cash App)
dataVerified: Sender, recipient, amount, payment description, timestamp
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents P2P payment disputes ("I never received payment"). Domain binding verifies payment platform. Tamper-evident transaction record. Tax reporting for business transactions. Split payment verification (shared expenses, group purchases).
